description: This CowboyStudio Tripod Dolly is very compact and portable and would be a great addition to your studio. The tripod dolly is basically the same thing as a tripod with the added feature of having wheels attached at the bottom.The wheels make it easy to create a moving shot while adding the freedom to move the tripod around with ease. This is a very convenient way of still being able to use the tripod and easily maneuver it without the hassle of having to carry it wherever you go.The adjustable foot locks also allow you the benefit to lock the wheels in place.Specifications:Folds down to 57cm (22.5")Weighs 2.4kg (5.3 lbs)Adjustable to fit any tripodAdjustable foot locks to lock the tripod downWheel locks on all 3 wheelsMetal wheels with nylon "tires"Wheels measure 2 3/4" in diameterDirections:Open the legs of the dolly all the way until they click in place.Next, you are going to want to stand your tripod on the dolly. To do this, you might want to lock the wheels of the base in place to prevent them from rolling.One at a time you can use the screw to tighten the legs of the tripod to the dolly. Make sure it is secure before adding any extra weight or accessories to the tripod.After everything is attached properly, you can attach your camera, unlock the wheels, and begin using the dolly.
title: CowboyStudio Professional Tripod Dolly Used is Photography and Videography, with Handle and Carrying Case
